suite.doc: DDN Advanced Real-Time Test Scenarios - Robot Framework Multi-tenancy, Security, and Compliance Tests: - Domain-based isolation and management - Multi-tenancy with namespace isolation - Quota management and enforcement - S3 protocol multi-tenancy - Kerberos authentication - Data governance and compliance All failures automatically reported to MongoDB via listener
